titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week.
Supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week, including:
raising awareness about the importance of community gardens and urban agriculture; improving access to public land for the creation of sustainable food projects; encouraging growth of community gardens; and supporting cooperative efforts among federal, state, local governments, and nonprofit organizations to promote the development and expansion of community gardens.
